article: One summer, three friends came to New York. They decided to stay in a hotel during the visit. But they felt  _  because their room was on the 60th floor. And for safety, the hotel closed the elevators  _  12:00 every night. The next day, the three friends rented a  _  and went out to travel around the city. They  _  movies, concerts , and other things. When they returned to the  _  , it was  _  . The elevators were stopped. So they had to take the stairs. At that time, One friend got a(n)  _  . He said, "For the first 20 floors, I will tell jokes. Then another of us will  _  smart stories for the next 20 floors . Then we will finish  the other  20 floors with sad stories." Soon, The first one started with his jokes. With joy, The reached the 20th floor. Then the next one started telling some smart stories. So, they learned a lot when reaching the 40th floor. In the end, It was time for sad stories. The third one started like this. "My first  _  story is that I left the key to the door in the car."
